description: Add Only flag determines whether the service will allow updates.  Set the flag to 1 for Add Only.  Set the flag to 0 or simply do not include the flag to allow Updates.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_RuleObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_RuleObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_RuleObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Interest and Late Fee Rule Work Set

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: Contains a unique identifier for the Finance Charge Rule.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_Rule_TypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_Rule_TypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_Rule_TypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: Rule Type for the Finance Charge Rule.  Can either be an Interest Rate or a Late Fee Rule. This field is required and must have a value.

validation.validation: Annual Percentage is required when Rule Type equals Interest Rate.

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: Unique name for the Finance Charge Rule. This field is required and must have a value.
The description for this Finance Charge Rule.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_FrequencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_FrequencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Interest_and_Late_Fee_FrequencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: Retrieves or submits the Frequency attribute for the Finance Charge Rule.  Value can either be One Time or Recurring. This field is required and must have a value.

Frequency_BehaviorObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Frequency_BehaviorObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Frequency_BehaviorObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: Retrieves or submits the Calculation Method for the Finance Charge Rule.  It's a required field and must have a value when the Frequency is Recurring.  Valid values are Daily and Monthly.
Retrieves or submits the Annual Percentage Rate charged for each Finance Charge Rule. This is a required field when the Rule Type is Interest Rate.

validation.validation: Enter either an Amount or Annual Percentage, but not both.  Amount is valid only with a rule type of Late Fee.  Annual Percentage is valid only with a rule type of Interest Rate.

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: Retrieves or submits the Amount of fee to be charged. This is a required field when the Rule Type is Late Fee.

validation.validation: An amount greater than zero is required when Rule Type equals Late Fee.

CurrencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CurrencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CurrencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: The preferred currency for this rule. It's required when the Rule Type is Late Fee.

validation.validation: Enter either an Amount or Annual Percentage, but not both.  Amount is valid only with a rule type of Late Fee.  Annual Percentage is valid only with a rule type of Interest Rate.

Finance_Charge_Rule_Data.description: Number of days you allow from due date of an invoice before you begin to assess finance charges. A payment after the due date but during the grace period won't incur interest charges or late fees.
Number of days you allow before you begin to generate the interest or late fee document after the first processing run.

When the flag is set to Inactive, you can no longer apply the rule to a company. Though, you can continue to retrieve or update the rule. You can also submit a request to set the Finance Charge Rule back to active.

description: Element containing Finance Charge Rule data.

validation.validation: Calculation Method Reference is not valid when Frequency Reference equals One Time.

validation.validation: Currency Reference is not valid for Interest Rate rule type.
validation.description: Currency Reference is not valid for Interest Rate rule type.

validation.validation: Currency Reference is required for Late Fee rule type.

validation.validation: Calculation Method Reference is required when Frequency Reference is Recurring.

validation.validation: Rule Type, Frequency, and Calculation Method cannot be changed when a Rule is In Use.
